Home » 29Dhs Dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷi » 2 Niddesa » 2.4 Aṭṭhakathākaṇḍa » 2.4.2 Dukaatthuddhāra » 2.4.2.5 Ganthagocchaka
2.4.2.5.2 Ganthaniyaduka
Niddesa
Aṭṭhakathākaṇḍa
Dukaatthuddhāra
Ganthagocchaka
Ganthaniyaduka
1491.
2202Katame dhammā ganthaniyā? Tīsu bhūmīsu kusalaṃ, akusalaṃ, tīsu bhūmīsu vipāko, tīsu bhūmīsu kiriyābyākataṃ, sabbañca rūpaṃ—  ime dhammā ganthaniyā.
1492.
2203Katame dhammā aganthaniyā? Cattāro maggā apariyāpannā, cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, nibbānañca—  ime dhammā aganthaniyā.
<< 2.4.2.5.1 Ganthadukaup2.4.2.5.3 Ganthasampayuttaduka >>
